snippet: The Lede is following developments in the Trayvon Martin case on Wednesday. A special prosecutor is expected to announce charges against George Zimmerman, who shot the unarmed teen in February, at a news conference scheduled for 6 p.m.
abstract: The Lede is following developments in the Trayvon Martin case on Wednesday. A special prosecutor is expected to announce charges against George Zimmerman, who shot the unarmed teen in February, at a news conference scheduled for 6 p.m.

headline.main: Latest Updates on the Trayvon Martin Case
